name: Kishore & Kishore
overview:
Kishore & Kishore is one of the reputed service providers, engaged in providing auditing, taxation and counseling services on corporate and other related laws. These are known for client specific approach and cost effectives.

Established in the year 1964, Kishore & Kishore is one of the well recognized organizations, engaged in providing taxation, auditing and counseling services on corporate and other related laws. Their services encompass Management Aided Services, Operational System, Taxation Consultancy Services and Accounting Services. Along with this, they also offer Certifications & IT Services, Corporate Counseling, Statutory Audit Services and Audit Services and Reviews.

Engaged in providing taxation services like taxation & corporate law services, taxation services and tax audit services, service tax issues, accounting services, audit services, operational system and reviews, information technology audit and related services, corporate counseling, management aided services and statutory audit services etc.

Contact Details Kishore & Kishore Mr. S. C.
